column1: NOTE: Please use the rendered version of this file.
{%-assign paths = ''%}{%for path in file.ExpectedLocations%}{%assign paths = paths | append:path%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign paths = paths | append:'
{%-assign resources = ''%}{%for resource in file.Resources%}{%assign resources = resources | append:resource%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign resources = resources | append:'

{%-assign acknowledgements = ''%}{%for acknowledgement in file.Acknowledgements%}{%assign acknowledgements = acknowledgements | append:acknowledgement.Name%}{%if acknowledgement.Twitter != null and acknowledgement.Twitter != ""%}{%assign acknowledgements = acknowledgements | append:' (' | append:acknowledgement.Twitter | append:')'%}{%endif%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign acknowledgements = acknowledgements | append:'
{%-assign hashes = ''-%}{%-for hash in command.SHA256%}{%assign hashes = hashes | append:hash%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign hashes = hashes | append:'
